attributes.action: Start research into the use of Molten Salt Reactor nuclear power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Molten Salt Reactors (MSR) have the potential to solve many of the problems of current nuclear power stations. 
They produce a fraction of the nuclear waste of conventional nuclear stations. The waste they do produce is mostly short lived (half life < 30 years). 
They can use spent fuel from conventional nuclear stations and decommissioned weapons as fuel.
They don't create plutonium.
They are inherently safer than any gas or water cooled reactor as the primary circuit is not pressurised. The quantity of fuel in the reactor is less and they use the fuel much more efficiently.
